title: Brenda J. Allen Identity & Inclusion Scholarship
description: To provide support for recognition of diversity and inclusion at CU Denver by providing the Brenda J. Allen Identity & Inclusion Scholarship and the Brenda J. Allen Award for Inclusive Leadership.
marketingContent: To provide support for recognition of diversity and inclusion at CU Denver by providing the Brenda J. Allen Center for Identity & Inclusion Scholarship and the Brenda J. Allen Award for Inclusive Leadership
